Articles.Content:
A quick video showing a plane i made when 0.25 came out! If you want more pics/info tell me! I will edit in some screenshots for people too lazy to view the video soon!

The first and main version is the Dart 3.0
111 parts. No mods

Action groups:
1. Open/close cargo bay
2. First set of bombs
3. Second set of bombs.
4. Missiles
First three stages = disk missiles


Download: Will add when i got time

The 2nd version is the cargo version, same as the normal but without any weapons. (Some very small changes too)
No mods, 49 parts. "Dart 3. G"

Action groups:
1. Open/close cargo bay


Download when i get time!

Third version is Dart 3 b. SSTO
No mods 88 parts.
It has more fuel/oxidizer and also has mono-propellant. A bit longer then the normal but goes into SPACE.
Goes into orbit with very little fuel left, but around 250-280 rcs fuel
Action groups:
1. Toggle cargo bay



Same as others, download later





(Dunno why there is a decoupler, removed now.)

Edited October 30, 2014 by MysticPing
